question: Which bank has launched new fixed deposit scheme 'FD Health'?
explanation: The ICICI Bank has launched a new Fixed Deposit (FD) scheme - FD Health that provides the customer a complimentary critical illness cover of Rs 1 lakh from ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company on opening an FD of Rs 2 lakh to Rs 3 lakh for tenure of at least two years. For investors in FD Health, ICICI Bank will offer the insurance cover free of cost for the first year and thereafter, they can renew it.
